title: S5 Bronze II seeking team/duo.
body:
Hey,

Don't mind my name, I swear I'm not some stupid swagboi, just a reference to some previous games with some buddies I play with. Anyways, I'm looking for a team to play with a couple times a week, or at least once a week.

I play jungle and top primarily as well as support and mid when I have to. My weakest lane  is bot, as ADC and a mid follows pretty close after. I'm not great by any means, but I play for the team and it would be cool getting tips and tricks from team mates to improve my overall skill level. I'm not shooting for the stars, just want an active team, so add me if you want another member for your team or someone to duo with.

IGN: I are Goat

Cheers.

replies.body:
If you want to duo i main mid and bot lane 
IGN:TheGingninj69
